mapper.select: select count(quote_entry_id) from e_quote_entry where creation_date = date('now', 'localtime')

select q.quote_entry_id, q.creation_date, q.total_amount, q.invoice_type, q.tax_rate, q.drawer, q.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name as company_abbreviated_name, c.full_name as company_full_name, c.phone as company_phone, c.remark as company_remark, q.remark, q.is_modified from e_quote_entry as q join c_partner_company as c on q.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id where q.partner_company_id = #{id} order by q.quote_entry_id desc

select quote_product_id, quote_entry_id, p.sku_id, sku_full.code, sku_full.unit_name, sku_full.factory_code, quantity, p.remark, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax from e_quote_product as p join sku_full on p.sku_id = sku_full.sku_id where quote_entry_id = #{id} order by quote_product_id
mapper.update: update e_quote_entry set total_amount = #{totalAmount}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType}, remark = #{remark}, is_modified = 1 where quote_entry_id = #{quoteEntryID}

update e_quote_product set quantity = #{quantity}, remark = #{remark}, tax_rate = #{taxRate}, unit_price_without_tax = #{unitPriceWithoutTax}, unit_price_with_tax = #{unitPriceWithTax} where quote_product_id = #{quoteProductID}
